exceptions.exn: In environment W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s The term "s" has type "state" while it is expected to have type "coh p (getS ?s l)".

In environment W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s Unable to unify "exists (s' : state) (r : ?M1551), a_step ?M1555 s' r" with "exists (s' : state) (r : V), skip_step S s' r".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
W: world
this: nid
l: Ordered.sort Label
p: protocol
pf: getP l = p
V: Type
f: forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V
s: state
S: skip_safe s

Goal:
exists (s' : state) (r : V), skip_step S s' r

Premises:
world = (context * hooks)%type : Type
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
protocol = Protocols.protocol : Type
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
skip_safe = [eta Coh W] : state -> Prop
coh : forall p : Protocols.protocol, cohpred (Protocols.nodes p)
nid = nat : Set
skip_step : forall s1 : state, skip_safe s1 -> state -> V -> Prop
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
find_some : find ?k ?f = Some ?v -> ?k \in dom ?f where ?K : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- ordType] ?V : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- Type] ?U : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- union_map_class ?K ?V] ?k : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) ->...-> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- UMC.sort ?U]
find_none : find ?k ?f = None -> ?k \notin dom ?f where ?K : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- ordType] ?V : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- Type] ?U : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- union_map_class ?K ?V] ?k : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) ->...-> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- UMC.sort ?U]
pts : ?K -> ?V -> ?cT where ?K : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- ordType] ?V : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- Type] ?cT : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- union_map_class ?K ?V]
eqP : reflect (?x = ?y) (?x == ?y) where ?T : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- eqType] ?x : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- Equality.sort ?T] ?y : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- Equality.sort ?T]
Mem : ?pT -> Mem_Pred ?T where ?T : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- Type] ?pT : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- PredType ?T]
mem : ?pT -> mem_pred ?T where ?T : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- Type] ?pT : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- predType ?T]
key : ?K * ?V -> ?K where ?K : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- ordType] ?V : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- Type]

snd_uniq0 : uniq (Protocols.snd_tags [::]) where ?nodes : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- dstatelet -> pred nid] ?coh : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- cohpred ?nodes]
rcv_uniq0 : uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags [::]) where ?nodes : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- dstatelet -> pred nid] ?coh : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- cohpred ?nodes]
Protocols.snd_tags : seq (send_trans ?coh) -> seq nat where ?nodes : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- dstatelet -> pred nid] ?coh : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- cohpred ?nodes]
Protocols.rcv_tags : seq (receive_trans ?coh) -> seq nat where ?nodes : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- dstatelet -> pred nid] ?coh : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- cohpred ?nodes]
orP : reflect (?b1 \/ ?b2) (?b1 || ?b2) where ?b1 : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- bool] ?b2 : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- bool]
andP : reflect (?b1 /\ ?b2) (?b1 && ?b2) where ?b1 : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- bool] ?b2 : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- bool]
Action : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a_safe : state -> Prop), (forall s : state, a_safe s -> s \In Coh W) -> forall a_step : forall s1 : state, a_safe s1 -> state -> V -> Prop, (forall (s : state) (pf : a_safe s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), a_step s pf s' r) -> (forall (s1 : state) (pf : a_safe s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), a_step s1 pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2) -> action W V this
Unit : ?cT where ?cT : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- pcm]
valid : ?cT -> bool where ?cT : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- pcm]
PCM.join : ?cT -> ?cT -> ?cT where ?cT : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- pcm]
pred0 : simpl_pred ?T where ?T : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- Type]
ord : rel ?T where ?T : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- ordType]
eq_op : rel ?T where ?T : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- eqType]
uniq : seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- eqType]
in_mem : ?T -> mem_pred ?T -> bool where ?T : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- Type]
ssrbool.SimplPred : pred ?T -> simpl_pred ?T where ?T : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- Type]
pred_of_seq : seq_eqclass ?T -> {pred ?T} where ?T : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- eqType]
eq_mem : mem_pred ?T -> mem_pred ?T -> Prop where ?T : [W : world this : nid l : Label p : protocol pf : getP l = p V : Type f : forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V s : state S : skip_safe s |- Type]
step_total : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : action W V this) (s : state) (pf : a_safe a s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), a_step pf s' r
Record action (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) : Type := Action { a_safe : state -> Prop; a_safe_coh : forall s : state, a_safe s -> s \In Coh W; a_step : forall s1 : state, a_safe s1 -> state -> V -> Prop; step_total : forall (s : state) (pf : a_safe s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), a_step s pf s' r; step_sem : forall (s1 : state) (pf : a_safe s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), a_step s1 pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2 } Arguments action _ _%type_scope Arguments Action [W] [V]%type_scope [this] [a_safe]%function_scope _%function_scope [a_step]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
safe_local : forall s : state, skip_safe s -> coh p (getS s l)
coh_coh : forall (w : world) (s : state) (l : Label), Coh w s -> coh (getProtocol w l) (getS s l)
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getS s l)] : world -> Pred state
getsE : forall (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> find l s = Some (getS s l)
Coh_dom : forall (w : world) (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> Coh w s -> dom (dstate (getS s l)) =i nodes (getProtocol w l) (getS s l)
coh_s : forall (w : world) (l : Label) (s : state), Coh w s -> coh (getProtocol w l) (getS s l)
step_sem : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : action W V this) (s1 : state) (pf : a_safe a s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), a_step pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
step_other : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (V : Type) (a : action W V this) (l : Label) (s1 s2 : state) (r : V) (n : nat_eqType) (pf : a_safe a s1), this != n -> a_step pf s2 r -> getLocal n (getS s1 l) = getLocal n (getS s2 l)
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getS s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getS s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getS s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getS s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) -> (forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getS s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getS s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getS s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getS s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) -> (forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getS s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getS s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getS s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getS s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> P) ->...-> P
step_preserves_node_ids : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (l : Label), l \in dom s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2 -> dom (dstate (getS s1 l)) =i dom (dstate (getS s2 l))
```simpl. exists s; exists (f s (coh_coh _ _ _ S)). apply step_total.```

original: simpl. exists s; exists (f s (coh_coh _ _ _ S)). apply step_total.
